fields.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
fields.description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce.
fields.instructions: Chop vegetables, stir fry in sesame oil, add soy sauce, cook until tender.
fields.image_alt: Colorful stir fry with broccoli, peppers, and carrots

fields.title: Classic Caesar Salad
fields.description: A fresh Caesar salad with crispy romaine lettuce and tangy dressing.
fields.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add cheese and croutons, top with anchovies if desired.
fields.image_alt: Caesar salad with Parmesan and croutons

fields.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
fields.description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies, soft and chewy.
fields.instructions: Cream butter and sugars, add eggs and vanilla, mix in dry ingredients, fold in chocolate chips, bake until golden.

fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: Creamy Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
fields.instructions: Cook pasta, fry pancetta, mix eggs and cheese, toss hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta, season with black pepper.

fields.title: Guacamole
fields.description: Fresh and creamy avocado dip with lime and cilantro.
fields.instructions: Mash avocados, mix in diced onion, tomato, cilantro, lime juice, and salt to taste.
fields.image_alt: Bowl of guacamole with tortilla chips

fields.title: Blueberry Pancakes
fields.description: Fluffy pancakes studded with fresh blueberries.
fields.instructions: Mix dry ingredients, whisk in wet ingredients, fold in blueberries, cook on griddle until golden brown.
fields.image_alt: Stack of blueberry pancakes with syrup
